00045 typedef leda::GRAPH<leda_point, int> well_graph;

00047 class well_point_set
00048 {
00049 public:
00050   typedef wg_split_func split_func;
00051 
00052   void compute(well_graph&, split_func, int ghost_n, double ghost_r);
00053   void update(const well_type*);
00054   void remove(const well_type*);
00055   void clear();
00056 
00057   leda_list<leda_point> c_hull() const;
00058   well_point_set(): w_node(w_system, nil) {}
00059 
00060 private:
00061   leda_point_set w_system;
00062   leda_node_map<const well_type*> w_node;
00063 };
00064 
00065 void well_point_set::update(const well_type* w)
00066 {
00067   if (w->name[0] == 0)
00068   {
00069     std::cerr << "X::update() error: wellbore name is invalid\n";
00070     return;
00071   }
00072 
00073   leda_point p(w->top_x, w->top_y);
00074   leda_node n = w_system.lookup(p);
00075   if (n == nil)
00076   {
00077     n = w_system.insert(p);
00078   }
00079   else
00080   {
00081     std::cerr << "X::update() warning: duplicate points detected\n";
00082     std::cerr << "\tnode " << w->name << ": " << w->top_x << ", " << w->top_y << std::endl;
00083 
00084     const well_type* ww = w_node[n];
00085     std::cerr << "\tnode " << ww->name << ": " << ww->top_x << ", " << ww->top_y << std::endl;
00086   }
00087 
00088   w_node[n] = w;
00089 }
00090 
00091 void well_point_set::clear()
00092 {
00093   w_system.clear();
00094 }
00095 
00096 void well_point_set::remove(const well_type* w)
00097 {
00098   leda_point p(w->top_x, w->top_y);
00099   leda_node n = w_system.lookup(p);
00100   if (n != nil)
00101   {
00102     w_system.del(n);
00103   }
00104 }
00105 
00106 leda_list<leda_point> well_point_set::c_hull() const
00107 {
00108   leda_edge ee = w_system.get_hull_edge(), e = ee;
00109   leda_list<leda_point> lp;
00110   do 
00111   {
00112     lp.append(w_system.pos_source(e));
00113     e = w_system.face_cycle_succ(e);
00114   }
00115   while (e != ee);
00116   return lp;
00117 }
00118 
00119 static leda_point center_of_icircle(const leda_point& p0, const leda_point& p1, const leda_point& p2) {
00120   // edges
00121   leda_vector e0 = p1 - p0;
00122   leda_vector e1 = p2 - p1;
00123   leda_vector e2 = p0 - p2;
00124 
00125   // normals
00126   leda_vector n0 = e0.rotate90().norm();
00127   leda_vector n1 = e1.rotate90().norm();
00128   leda_vector n2 = e2.rotate90().norm();
00129 
00130   double a0 = n1 * e0;
00131   double a1 = n2 * e1;
00132   double a2 = n0 * e2;
00133   double invA0 = 1.0 / a0;
00134   double invA1 = 1.0 / a1;
00135   double invA2 = 1.0 / a2;
00136 
00137   double R = 1.0 / (invA0 + invA1 + invA2);
00138   leda_vector v0(p0.xcoord(), p0.ycoord());
00139   leda_vector v1(p1.xcoord(), p1.ycoord());
00140   leda_vector v2(p2.xcoord(), p2.ycoord());
00141   return (v0 * invA0 + v1 * invA1 + v2 * invA2) * R;
00142 }
00143 
00144 class edge_cmp: public leda::leda_cmp_base<leda_edge>
00145 {
00146   const well_graph& g;
00147 public:
00148   edge_cmp(const well_graph& init): g(init) {}
00149   int operator() (const leda_edge& e1, const leda_edge& e2) const
00150   {
00151     leda_point s1 = g.inf(g.source(e1));
00152     leda_point t1 = g.inf(g.target(e1));
00153     leda_point s2 = g.inf(g.source(e2));
00154     leda_point t2 = g.inf(g.target(e2));
00155     return compare_by_angle(t1 - s1, t2 - s2);
00156   }
00157 };
00158 
00159 static void arrange_edges(well_graph& g)
00160 {
00161   leda_list<leda_edge> e = g.all_edges();
00162   e.sort(edge_cmp(g));
00163   g.sort_edges(e);
00164   g.compute_faces();
00165 }
00166 
00167 void well_point_set::compute(well_graph& g, split_func split, int ghost_n, double ghost_r)
00168 {
00169   g.clear();
00170 
00171   // STEP1 -- adding ghost wells around the system
00172   {
00173     leda_list<leda_point> pp = w_system.points();
00174     leda_circle c1 = SMALLEST_ENCLOSING_CIRCLE(pp), c2 = LARGEST_EMPTY_CIRCLE(pp);
00175     double d2 = c2.radius(), d1 = c1.radius() + 2 * d2;
00176 
00177     if (ghost_n < 12)
00178       ghost_n = 12;
00179     if (ghost_r < d1)
00180       ghost_r = d1;
00181 
00182     leda_circle c(c1.center(), ghost_r);
00183     for (int i = 0; i < ghost_n; i++)
00184     {
00185       leda_point p = c.point_on_circle(2 * LEDA_PI * i / ghost_n);
00186       leda_node n = w_system.insert(p);
00187       w_node[n] = 0;
00188     }
00189   }
00190 
00191   // STEP 2 -- calling external function to split triangles edges
00192   leda_point init;
00193   leda_edge_array<leda_point> e_split(w_system, init);
00194   {
00195     leda_edge e;
00196     forall_edges(e, w_system)
00197     {
00198       if (identical(e_split[e], init))
00199       {
00200         const well_type *w1 = w_node[w_system.source(e)];
00201         const well_type *w2 = w_node[w_system.target(e)];
00202 
00203         double t;
00204         leda_point p1 = w_system.pos_source(e), p2 = w_system.pos_target(e);
00205         if (w1 != 0 && w2 != 0)
00206         {
00207           t = split(w1, w2);
00208         }
00209         else if (w1 != 0)
00210         {
00211           well_type w2 = { "", (float) p2.xcoord(), (float) p2.ycoord() };
00212           t = split(w1, &w2);
00213         }
00214         else if (w2 != 0)
00215         {
00216           well_type w1 = { "", (float) p1.xcoord(), (float) p1.ycoord() };
00217           t = split(&w1, w2);
00218         }
00219         else
00220         {
00221           well_type w1 = { "", (float) p1.xcoord(), (float) p1.ycoord() };
00222           well_type w2 = { "", (float) p2.xcoord(), (float) p2.ycoord() };
00223           t = split(&w1, &w2);
00224         }
00225         assert(t > 0.0 && t < 1.0);
00226         e_split[e] = e_split[w_system.reversal(e)] = p1 + (p2 - p1) * t;
00227       }
00228     }
00229   }
00230 
00231   // STEP 3 -- generate nodes of result graph
00232   leda_edge_array<leda_node> f_node(w_system, nil);
00233   leda_edge_array<leda_node> e_node(w_system, nil);
00234   {
00235     leda_edge e;
00236     forall_edges(e, w_system)
00237     {   
00238       leda_edge e1, e2, e3;
00239       if (w_system.is_hull_edge(e1 = e))
00240         continue;
00241 
00242       if (!w_system.is_hull_edge(e) && f_node[e] == nil)
00243       {
00244         leda_point p1 = e_split[e1];
00245         leda_point p2 = e_split[e2 = w_system.face_cycle_succ(e1)];
00246         leda_point p3 = e_split[e3 = w_system.face_cycle_succ(e2)];
00247         leda_node n = g.new_node(center_of_icircle(p1, p2, p3));
00248         f_node[e1] = f_node[e2] = f_node[e3] = n;
00249       }
00250 
00251       e1 = e, e2 = w_system.reversal(e1);
00252       if (!w_system.is_hull_edge(e1) && !w_system.is_hull_edge(e2) && e_node[e] == nil)
00253       {
00254         e_node[e1] = e_node[e2] = g.new_node(e_split[e]);
00255       }
00256     }
00257   }
00258   // NB: here we can destroy e_split array
00259 
00260   // STEP 4 -- loop around wellbore nodes
00261   leda_node_array<leda_node> n_node(w_system, nil);
00262   {
00263     leda_node n;
00264     forall_nodes(n, w_system)
00265     {
00266       const well_type* w = w_node[n];
00267       if (w != 0)
00268       {
00269         leda_point p = w_system.pos(n);
00270         leda_node n2, n1 = g.new_node(p);
00271         n_node[n] = n1;
00272 
00273         leda_edge e, e1, e2;
00274         forall_adj_edges(e, n)
00275         {
00276           n2 = e_node[e];
00277           e1 = g.new_edge(n1, n2, (int) w);
00278           e2 = g.new_edge(n2, n1, (int) w);
00279           g.set_reversal(e1, e2);
00280 
00281           n2 = f_node[e];
00282           e1 = g.new_edge(n1, n2, (int) w);
00283           e2 = g.new_edge(n2, n1, (int) w);
00284           g.set_reversal(e1, e2);
00285         }
00286       }
00287     }
00288   }
00289 
00290   // STEP 5 -- connect edge nodes with face nodes
00291   {
00292     leda_edge e;
00293     forall_edges(e, w_system)
00294     {
00295       if (w_system.is_hull_edge(e))
00296         continue;
00297 
00298       leda_edge e1 = e, e2 = w_system.reversal(e);
00299       if (index(e1) > index(e2))
00300         continue;
00301 
00302       leda_node s = w_system.source(e), t = w_system.target(e);
00303       const well_type *w1 = w_node[s], *w2 = w_node[t];
00304 
00305       leda_node n0 = e_node[e];
00306       leda_node n1 = f_node[e1];
00307       leda_node n2 = f_node[e2];
00308 
00309       if (n0 == nil)
00310         continue;
00311 
00312       e1 = g.new_edge(n1, n0, (int) w2);
00313       e2 = g.new_edge(n0, n1, (int) w1);
00314       g.set_reversal(e1, e2);
00315 
00316       e1 = g.new_edge(n2, n0, (int) w1);
00317       e2 = g.new_edge(n0, n2, (int) w2);
00318       g.set_reversal(e1, e2);
00319     }
00320   }
00321 
00322   // STEP 6 -- rearrange edge list and make a map
00323   arrange_edges(g);
00324   w_system.clear();
00325 }
00326 
00327 class node_func
00328 {
00329 public:
00330   node_func(const well_graph& init);
00331   virtual double apply(leda_node n) const = 0;
00332   const well_graph& dom() const;
00333 
00334 private:
00335   const well_graph& g;
00336 };
00337 
00338 class half_space: public node_func
00339 {
00340 public:
00341   half_space(const well_graph& g, double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2);
00342   double apply(leda_node n) const;
00343 
00344 private:
00345   double a, b, c;
00346 };
00347 
00348 node_func::node_func(const well_graph& init): g(init)
00349 {
00350 }
00351 
00352 const well_graph& node_func::dom() const
00353 {
00354   return g;
00355 }
00356 
00357 half_space::half_space(const well_graph& init, double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2): 
00358   node_func(init)
00359 {
00360   double dx = x2 - x1, dy = y2 - y1;
00361   a = dy, b = -dx, c = -a * x1 - b * y1;
00362 }
00363 
00364 double half_space::apply(leda_node n) const
00365 {
00366   leda_point p = dom()[n];
00367   return (a * p.xcoord() + b * p.ycoord() + c);
00368 }
00369 
00370 static void classify(const node_func& fn, well_graph& g1, well_graph& g2)
00371 {
00372   const well_graph& g = fn.dom();
00373   leda_node_array<double> fx(g);
00374 
00375   leda_node n;
00376   forall_nodes(n, g)
00377   {
00378     fx[n] = fn.apply(n);
00379   }
00380 
00381   g1.clear();
00382   g2.clear();
00383 
00384   leda_node_array<leda_node> n1(g, nil), n2(g, nil);
00385   leda_edge_array<leda_node> e1(g, nil), e2(g, nil);
00386   leda::face_array<bool> visit(g, false); // TODO: заменить на leda_edge_array<bool>
00387 
00388   double eps = 0.0000001;
00389   forall_nodes(n, g)
00390   {
00391     if (fx[n] < -eps)
00392       n1[n] = g1.new_node(g[n]);
00393     else if (fx[n] > eps)
00394       n2[n] = g2.new_node(g[n]);
00395     else
00396     {
00397       n1[n] = g1.new_node(g[n]);
00398       n2[n] = g2.new_node(g[n]);
00399     }
00400   }
00401 
00402   leda_edge h1, h2, e;
00403   forall_edges(e, g)
00404   {
00405     leda_node s = g.source(e), t = g.target(e);
00406     leda_edge r = g.reversal(e);
00407     if (index(e) > index(r))
00408       continue;
00409 
00410     if (n1[s] != nil && n2[s] == nil && n1[t] == nil && n2[t] != nil
00411     ||  n1[s] == nil && n2[s] != nil && n1[t] != nil && n2[t] == nil)
00412     {
00413       leda_point p = g[s] + (g[t] - g[s]) * fx[s] / (fx[s] - fx[t]);
00414       e1[e] = e1[r] = g1.new_node(p);
00415       e2[e] = e2[r] = g2.new_node(p);
00416     }
00417   }
00418 
00419   forall_edges(e, g)
00420   {
00421     leda_edge r = g.reversal(e);
00422     if (index(e) > index(r))
00423       continue;
00424 
00425     leda_node s = g.source(e), t = g.target(e);
00426 
00428     // случай 1 -- ребро в отрицательной полуплоскости
00429     if (n1[s] != nil && n1[t] != nil && (n2[s] == nil || n2[t] == nil))
00430     {
00431       h1 = g1.new_edge(n1[s], n1[t], g[e]);
00432       h2 = g1.new_edge(n1[t], n1[s], g[r]);
00433       g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00434     }
00435     // случай 1 -- ребро в отрицательной полуплоскости
00437 
00439     // случай 2 -- ребро в положительной полуплоскости
00440     else if ((n1[s] == nil || n1[t] == nil) && n2[s] != nil && n2[t] != nil)
00441     {
00442       h1 = g2.new_edge(n2[s], n2[t], g[e]);
00443       h2 = g2.new_edge(n2[t], n2[s], g[r]);
00444       g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00445     }
00446     // случай 2 -- ребро в положительной полуплоскости
00448 
00450     // случай 3 -- ребро направлено из отрицательной в положительную область
00451     else if (n1[s] != nil && n2[s] == nil && n1[t] == nil && n2[t] != nil)
00452     {
00453       h1 = g1.new_edge(n1[s], e1[e], g[e]);
00454       h2 = g1.new_edge(e1[r], n1[s], g[r]);
00455       g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00456 
00457       h1 = g2.new_edge(e2[e], n2[t], g[e]);
00458       h2 = g2.new_edge(n2[t], e2[r], g[r]);
00459       g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00460 
00461       // обработать грань, смежную с ребром e
00462       leda_face f = g.face_of(e);
00463       if (g[e] != 0 && !visit[f])
00464       {
00465         leda_edge succ_e = g.face_cycle_succ(e);
00466         leda_node opposite_n = g.target(succ_e);
00467         if (n1[opposite_n] == nil && n2[opposite_n] != nil)
00468         {
00469           leda_edge pred_e = g.face_cycle_pred(e);
00470 
00471           h1 = g1.new_edge(e1[e], e1[pred_e], g[e]);
00472           h2 = g1.new_edge(e1[pred_e], e1[e], 0);
00473           g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00474 
00475           leda_node a = e2[e], b = n2[t], c = n2[opposite_n], d = e2[pred_e];
00476 
00477           h1 = g2.new_edge(a, d, 0);
00478           h2 = g2.new_edge(d, a, g[e]);
00479           g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00480 
00481           // повести в четырёхугольнике диагональ с меньшей длиной
00482           if (g2[a].sqr_dist(g2[c]) <= g2[b].sqr_dist(g2[d]))
00483           {
00484             h1 = g2.new_edge(a, c, g[e]);
00485             h2 = g2.new_edge(c, a, g[e]);
00486             g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00487           }
00488           else
00489           {
00490             h1 = g2.new_edge(b, d, g[e]);
00491             h2 = g2.new_edge(d, b, g[e]);
00492             g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00493           }
00494         }
00495         else if (n1[opposite_n] != nil && n2[opposite_n] == nil)
00496         {
00497           leda_node a = e1[e], b = e1[succ_e], c = n1[opposite_n], d = n1[s];
00498 
00499           h1 = g1.new_edge(a, b, g[e]);
00500           h2 = g1.new_edge(b, a, 0);
00501           g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00502 
00503           h1 = g2.new_edge(e2[e], e2[succ_e], 0);
00504           h2 = g2.new_edge(e2[succ_e], e2[e], g[e]);
00505           g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00506 
00507           // повести в четырёхугольнике диагональ с меньшей длиной
00508           if (g1[a].sqr_dist(g1[c]) <= g1[b].sqr_dist(g1[d]))
00509           {
00510             h1 = g1.new_edge(a, c, g[e]);
00511             h2 = g1.new_edge(c, a, g[e]);
00512             g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00513           }
00514           else
00515           {
00516             h1 = g1.new_edge(b, d, g[e]);
00517             h2 = g1.new_edge(d, b, g[e]);
00518             g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00519           }
00520         }
00521         else if (n1[opposite_n] != nil && n2[opposite_n] != nil)
00522         {
00523           h1 = g1.new_edge(e1[e], n1[opposite_n], g[e]);
00524           h2 = g1.new_edge(n1[opposite_n], e1[e], 0);
00525           g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00526 
00527           h1 = g2.new_edge(e2[e], n2[opposite_n], 0);
00528           h2 = g2.new_edge(n2[opposite_n], e2[e], g[e]);
00529           g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00530         }
00531         else
00532           assert(0);
00533 
00534         visit[f] = true;
00535       }
00536 
00537       // обработать грань, смежную с ребром r
00538       f = g.face_of(r);
00539       if (g[r] != 0 && !visit[f])
00540       {
00541         leda_edge succ_r = g.face_cycle_succ(r);
00542         leda_node opposite_n = g.target(succ_r);
00543         if (n1[opposite_n] == nil && n2[opposite_n] != nil)
00544         {
00545           h1 = g1.new_edge(e1[r], e1[succ_r], 0);
00546           h2 = g1.new_edge(e1[succ_r], e1[r], g[r]);
00547           g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00548 
00549           leda_node a = e2[r], b = e2[succ_r], c = n2[opposite_n], d = n2[t];
00550 
00551           h1 = g2.new_edge(a, b, g[r]);
00552           h2 = g2.new_edge(b, a, 0);
00553           g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00554 
00555           if (g2[a].sqr_dist(g2[c]) <= g2[b].sqr_dist(g2[d]))
00556           {
00557             h1 = g2.new_edge(a, c, g[r]);
00558             h2 = g2.new_edge(c, a, g[r]);
00559             g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00560           }
00561           else
00562           {
00563             h1 = g2.new_edge(b, d, g[r]);
00564             h2 = g2.new_edge(d, b, g[r]);
00565             g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00566           }
00567         }
00568         else if (n1[opposite_n] != nil && n2[opposite_n] == nil)
00569         {
00570           leda_edge pred_r = g.face_cycle_pred(r);
00571 
00572           leda_node a = e1[r], b = n1[s], c = n1[opposite_n], d = e1[pred_r];
00573 
00574           h1 = g1.new_edge(a, d, 0);
00575           h2 = g1.new_edge(d, a, g[r]);
00576           g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00577 
00578           h1 = g2.new_edge(e2[r], e2[pred_r], g[r]);
00579           h2 = g2.new_edge(e2[pred_r], e2[r], 0);
00580           g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00581 
00582           if (g1[a].sqr_dist(g1[c]) <= g1[b].sqr_dist(g1[d]))
00583           {
00584             h1 = g1.new_edge(a, c, g[r]);
00585             h2 = g1.new_edge(c, a, g[r]);
00586             g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00587           }
00588           else
00589           {
00590             h1 = g1.new_edge(b, d, g[r]);
00591             h2 = g1.new_edge(d, b, g[r]);
00592             g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00593           }
00594         }
00595         else if (n1[opposite_n] != nil && n2[opposite_n] != nil)
00596         {
00597           h1 = g1.new_edge(e1[r], n1[opposite_n], 0);
00598           h2 = g1.new_edge(n1[opposite_n], e1[r], g[r]);
00599           g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00600 
00601           h1 = g2.new_edge(e2[r], n2[opposite_n], g[r]);
00602           h2 = g2.new_edge(n2[opposite_n], e2[r], 0);
00603           g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00604         }
00605         else
00606           assert(0);
00607 
00608         visit[f] = true;
00609       }
00610     }
00611     // случай 3 -- ребро направлено из отрицательной в положительную область
00613 
00615     // случай 4 -- ребро направлено из положительной в отрицательную область
00616     else if (n1[s] == nil && n2[s] != nil && n1[t] != nil && n2[t] == nil)
00617     {
00618       h1 = g1.new_edge(e1[e], n1[t], g[e]);
00619       h2 = g1.new_edge(n1[t], e1[r], g[r]);
00620       g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00621 
00622       h1 = g2.new_edge(n2[s], e2[e], g[e]);
00623       h2 = g2.new_edge(e2[r], n2[s], g[r]);
00624       g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00625 
00626       leda_face f = g.face_of(e);
00627       if (g[e] != 0 && !visit[f])
00628       {
00629         leda_edge succ_e = g.face_cycle_succ(e);
00630         leda_node opposite_n = g.target(succ_e);
00631         if (n1[opposite_n] == nil && n2[opposite_n] != nil)
00632         {
00633           h1 = g1.new_edge(e1[e], e1[succ_e], 0);
00634           h2 = g1.new_edge(e1[succ_e], e1[e], g[e]);
00635           g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00636 
00637           leda_node a = e2[e], b = e2[succ_e], c = n2[opposite_n], d = n2[s];
00638 
00639           h1 = g2.new_edge(a, b, g[e]);
00640           h2 = g2.new_edge(b, a, 0);
00641           g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00642 
00643           if (g2[a].sqr_dist(g2[c]) <= g2[b].sqr_dist(g2[d]))
00644           {
00645             h1 = g2.new_edge(a, c, g[e]);
00646             h2 = g2.new_edge(c, a, g[e]);
00647             g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00648           }
00649           else
00650           {
00651             h1 = g2.new_edge(b, d, g[e]);
00652             h2 = g2.new_edge(d, b, g[e]);
00653             g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00654           }
00655         }
00656         else if (n1[opposite_n] != nil && n2[opposite_n] == nil)
00657         {
00658           leda_edge pred_e = g.face_cycle_pred(e);
00659 
00660           leda_node a = e1[e], b = n1[t], c = n1[opposite_n], d = e1[pred_e];
00661 
00662           h1 = g1.new_edge(a, d, 0);
00663           h2 = g1.new_edge(d, a, g[e]);
00664           g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00665 
00666           h1 = g2.new_edge(e2[e], e2[pred_e], g[e]);
00667           h2 = g2.new_edge(e2[pred_e], e2[e], 0);
00668           g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00669 
00670           if (g1[a].sqr_dist(g1[c]) <= g1[b].sqr_dist(g1[d]))
00671           {
00672             h1 = g1.new_edge(a, c, g[e]);
00673             h2 = g1.new_edge(c, a, g[e]);
00674             g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00675           }
00676           else
00677           {
00678             h1 = g1.new_edge(b, d, g[e]);
00679             h2 = g1.new_edge(d, b, g[e]);
00680             g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00681           }
00682         }
00683         else if (n1[opposite_n] != nil && n2[opposite_n] != nil)
00684         {
00685           h1 = g1.new_edge(e1[e], n1[opposite_n], 0);
00686           h2 = g1.new_edge(n1[opposite_n], e1[e], g[e]);
00687           g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00688 
00689           h1 = g2.new_edge(e2[e], n2[opposite_n], g[e]);
00690           h2 = g2.new_edge(n2[opposite_n], e2[e], 0);
00691           g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00692         }
00693         else
00694           assert(0);
00695 
00696         visit[f] = true;
00697       }
00698 
00699       f = g.face_of(r);
00700       if (g[r] != 0 && !visit[f])
00701       {
00702         leda_edge succ_r = g.face_cycle_succ(r);
00703         leda_node opposite_n = g.target(succ_r);
00704         if (n1[opposite_n] == nil && n2[opposite_n] != nil)
00705         {
00706           leda_edge pred_r = g.face_cycle_pred(r);
00707 
00708           h1 = g1.new_edge(e1[r], e1[pred_r], g[r]);
00709           h2 = g1.new_edge(e1[pred_r], e1[r], 0);
00710           g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00711 
00712           leda_node a = e2[r], b = n2[s], c = n2[opposite_n], d = e2[pred_r];
00713 
00714           h1 = g2.new_edge(a, d, 0);
00715           h2 = g2.new_edge(d, a, g[r]);
00716           g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00717 
00718           if (g2[a].sqr_dist(g2[c]) <= g2[b].sqr_dist(g2[d]))
00719           {
00720             h1 = g2.new_edge(a, c, g[r]);
00721             h2 = g2.new_edge(c, a, g[r]);
00722             g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00723           }
00724           else
00725           {
00726             h1 = g2.new_edge(b, d, g[r]);
00727             h2 = g2.new_edge(d, b, g[r]);
00728             g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00729           }
00730         }
00731         else if (n1[opposite_n] != nil && n2[opposite_n] == nil)
00732         {
00733           leda_node a = e1[r], b = e1[succ_r], c = n1[opposite_n], d = n1[t];
00734 
00735           h1 = g1.new_edge(a, b, g[r]);
00736           h2 = g1.new_edge(b, a, 0);
00737           g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00738 
00739           h1 = g2.new_edge(e2[r], e2[succ_r], 0);
00740           h2 = g2.new_edge(e2[succ_r], e2[r], g[r]);
00741           g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00742 
00743           if (g1[a].sqr_dist(g1[c]) <= g1[b].sqr_dist(g1[d]))
00744           {
00745             h1 = g1.new_edge(a, c, g[r]);
00746             h2 = g1.new_edge(c, a, g[r]);
00747             g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00748           }
00749           else
00750           {
00751             h1 = g1.new_edge(b, d, g[r]);
00752             h2 = g1.new_edge(d, b, g[r]);
00753             g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00754           }
00755         }
00756         else if (n1[opposite_n] != nil && n2[opposite_n] != nil)
00757         {
00758           h1 = g1.new_edge(e1[r], n1[opposite_n], g[r]);
00759           h2 = g1.new_edge(n1[opposite_n], e1[r], 0);
00760           g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00761 
00762           h1 = g2.new_edge(e2[r], n2[opposite_n], 0);
00763           h2 = g2.new_edge(n2[opposite_n], e2[r], g[r]);
00764           g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00765         }
00766         else
00767           assert(0);
00768 
00769         visit[f] = true;
00770       }
00771     }
00772     // случай 4 -- ребро направлено из положительной в отрицательную область
00774 
00776     // случай 5 -- ребро на границе раздела
00777     else if (n1[s] != nil && n2[s] != nil && n1[t] != nil && n2[t] != nil)
00778     {
00779       if (g[e] == 0)
00780       {
00781         leda_edge succ_r = g.face_cycle_succ(r);
00782         leda_node opposite_n = g.target(succ_r);
00783         if (n1[opposite_n] != nil)
00784         {
00785           h1 = g1.new_edge(n1[s], n1[t], 0);
00786           h2 = g1.new_edge(n1[t], n1[s], g[r]);
00787           g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00788         }
00789         else if (n2[opposite_n] != nil)
00790         {
00791           h1 = g2.new_edge(n2[s], n2[t], 0);
00792           h2 = g2.new_edge(n2[t], n2[s], g[r]);
00793           g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00794         }
00795         else
00796           assert(0);
00797       }
00798       else if (g[r] == 0)
00799       {
00800         leda_edge succ_e = g.face_cycle_succ(e);
00801         leda_node opposite_n = g.target(succ_e);
00802         if (n1[opposite_n] != nil)
00803         {
00804           h1 = g1.new_edge(n1[s], n1[t], g[e]);
00805           h2 = g1.new_edge(n1[t], n1[s], 0);
00806           g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00807         }
00808         else if (n2[opposite_n] != nil)
00809         {
00810           h1 = g2.new_edge(n2[s], n2[t], g[e]);
00811           h2 = g2.new_edge(n2[t], n2[s], 0);
00812           g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00813         }
00814         else
00815           assert(0);
00816       }
00817       else
00818       {
00819         leda_edge succ_e = g.face_cycle_succ(e), succ_r = g.face_cycle_succ(r);
00820         leda_node opposite_e = g.target(succ_e), opposite_r = g.target(succ_r);
00821 
00822         if (n1[opposite_e] != nil && n1[opposite_r] == nil && n2[opposite_e] == nil && n2[opposite_r] != nil)
00823         {
00824           h1 = g1.new_edge(n1[s], n1[t], g[e]);
00825           h2 = g1.new_edge(n1[t], n1[s], 0);
00826           g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00827 
00828           h1 = g2.new_edge(n2[s], n2[t], 0);
00829           h2 = g2.new_edge(n2[t], n2[s], g[r]);
00830           g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00831         }
00832         else if (n1[opposite_e] == nil && n1[opposite_r] != nil && n2[opposite_e] != nil && n2[opposite_r] == nil)
00833         {
00834           h1 = g1.new_edge(n1[s], n1[t], 0);
00835           h2 = g1.new_edge(n1[t], n1[s], g[r]);
00836           g1.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00837 
00838           h1 = g2.new_edge(n2[s], n2[t], g[e]);
00839           h2 = g2.new_edge(n2[t], n2[s], 0);
00840           g2.set_reversal(h1, h2);
00841         }
00842         else
00843           assert(0);
00844       }
00845     }
00846     // случай 5 -- ребро на границе раздела
00848 
00849     else
00850       assert(0);
00851   }
00852 
00853   arrange_edges(g1);
00854   arrange_edges(g2);
00855 }
00856 
00857 struct well_grid_key { int cell; const well_type* well; };
00858 
00859 static int compare(const well_grid_key& k1, const well_grid_key& k2)
00860 {
00861   if (k1.cell < k2.cell)
00862     return -1;
00863 
00864   if (k1.cell == k2.cell)
00865   {
00866     if (k1.well < k2.well)
00867       return -1;
00868   
00869     if (k1.well == k2.well)
00870       return 0;
00871   }
00872 
00873   return 1;
00874 }
00875 
00876 class well_grid
00877 {
00878 public:
00879   typedef well_grid_key key;
00880 
00881   double left(int i) const;
00882   double right(int i) const;
00883   double top(int j) const;
00884   double bottom(int j) const;
00885   double inf(const well_type* w, int i, int j) const;
00886 
00887   void populate(const well_graph& g);
00888   well_grid(int cx, int cy, double x1, double x2, double y1, double y2);
00889   well_grid(int cx, int cy, double *init_x, double *init_y);
00890   ~well_grid();
00891 
00892 private:
00893   void traverse(const well_graph& g, int x1, int x2, int y1, int y2);
00894 
00895   leda_dictionary<key, double>* grid_fn;
00896   int countof_x, countof_y;
00897   double *coord_x, *coord_y;
00898 };
00899 
00900 well_grid::well_grid(int cx, int cy, double x1, double x2, double y1, double y2): 
00901   grid_fn(new leda_dictionary<key, double>(compare)), 
00902   countof_x(cx), 
00903   countof_y(cy)
00904 {
00905   coord_x = new double[cx+1];
00906   coord_y = new double[cy+1];
00907 
00908   double dx = (x2 - x1) / cx;
00909   coord_x[0] = x1;
00910   for (int i = 0; i < cx; i++)
00911     coord_x[i+1] = coord_x[i] + dx;
00912 
00913   double dy = (y2 - y1) / cy;
00914   coord_y[0] = y1;
00915   for (int j = 0; j < cy; j++)
00916     coord_y[j+1] = coord_y[j] + dy;
00917 }
00918 
00919 well_grid::well_grid(int cx, int cy, double *init_x, double *init_y): countof_x(cx), countof_y(cy)
00920 {
00921   coord_x = new double[cx+1];
00922   coord_y = new double[cy+1];
00923 
00924   for (int i = 0; i < cx+1; i++) 
00925     coord_x[i] = init_x[i];
00926 
00927   for (int j = 0; j < cy+1; j++)
00928     coord_y[j] = init_y[j];
00929 }
00930 
00931 well_grid::~well_grid()
00932 {
00933   delete grid_fn;
00934   delete[] coord_x;
00935   delete[] coord_y;
00936 }
00937 
00938 inline double well_grid::left(int i) const
00939 {
00940   return coord_x[i];
00941 }
00942 
00943 inline double well_grid::right(int i) const
00944 {
00945   return coord_x[i+1];
00946 }
00947 
00948 inline double well_grid::top(int j) const
00949 {
00950   return coord_y[j+1];
00951 }
00952 
00953 inline double well_grid::bottom(int j) const
00954 {
00955   return coord_y[j];
00956 }
00957 
00958 double well_grid::inf(const well_type* w, int i, int j) const
00959 {
00960   key k = { countof_x * j + i, w };
00961   leda::dic_item it = grid_fn->lookup(k);
00962   if (it != nil)
00963     return (*grid_fn)[it];
00964   return 0.0;
00965 }
00966 
00967 void well_grid::traverse(const well_graph& g0, int x1, int x2, int y1, int y2)
00968 {
00969   int cx = x2 - x1, cy = y2 - y1;
00970   if (cx == 1 && cy == 1)
00971   {
00972     // std::cout << "cell(" << x1 << ", " << y1 << ") visited\n";
00973     
00974     double a;
00975     leda_face f;
00976     leda_map<const well_type*, double> acc;
00977     const well_type* w;
00978     forall_faces(f, g0)
00979     {
00980       leda_edge e = g0.first_face_edge(f);
00981       w = (const well_type*) g0[e];
00982       if (w == 0)
00983         continue;
00984 
00985       leda_node s = g0.source(e), t = g0.target(e);
00986       leda_node o = g0.target(g0.face_cycle_succ(e));
00987 
00988       a = leda::triangle(g0[s], g0[t], g0[o]).area();
00989       assert(a >= 0.0);
00990 
00991       if (acc.defined(w))
00992         acc[w] += a;
00993       else
00994         acc[w] = a;
00995     }
00996 
00997     a = leda::rectangle(left(x1), bottom(y1), right(x1), top(y1)).area();
00998     assert(a >= 0.0);
00999 
01000     key k = { countof_x * y1 + x1 };
01001     forall_defined(w, acc)
01002     {
01003       std::ofstream ff("area", std::ios::app);
01004       ff << w->name << ' ' << k.cell << ' ' << acc[w]/a << '\n';
01005       
01006       // k.well = w;
01007       // grid_fn.insert(k, acc[w] / a);
01008     }
01009   }
01010   else if (cx < cy)
01011   {
01012     int y0 = ((y1 + y2) >> 1);
01013 
01014     well_graph g1, g2;
01015     classify(half_space(g0, left(x2), bottom(y0), left(x1), bottom(y0)), g1, g2);
01016     
01017     traverse(g1, x1, x2, y1, y0);
01018     traverse(g2, x1, x2, y0, y2);
01019   }
01020   else
01021   {
01022     int x0 = ((x1 + x2) >> 1);
01023 
01024     well_graph g1, g2;
01025     classify(half_space(g0, left(x0), bottom(y1), left(x0), bottom(y2)), g1, g2);
01026     
01027     traverse(g1, x1, x0, y1, y2);
01028     traverse(g2, x0, x2, y1, y2);
01029   }
01030 }
01031 
01032 void well_grid::populate(const well_graph& g0)
01033 {
01034   double x1 = coord_x[0], x2 = coord_x[countof_x];
01035   double y1 = coord_y[0], y2 = coord_y[countof_y];
01036 
01037   well_graph d1, g1, g2;
01038 
01039   classify(half_space(g0, x2, y1, x1, y1), d1, g2);
01040   classify(half_space(g2, x1, y1, x1, y2), d1, g1);
01041   classify(half_space(g1, x1, y2, x2, y2), d1, g2);
01042   classify(half_space(g2, x2, y2, x2, y1), d1, g1);
01043 
01044   d1.clear();
01045   g2.clear();
01046   
01047   grid_fn->clear();
01048   traverse(g1, 0, countof_x, 0, countof_y);
01049 }
01050 
01051 class wg_wrapper
01052 {
01053 public:
01054   typedef well_point_set::split_func split_func;
01055 
01056   wg_wrapper(int cx, int cy, double x1, double x2, double y1, double y2): g2(cx, cy, x1, x2, y1, y2) {}
01057   wg_wrapper(int cx, int cy, double *init_x, double *init_y): g2(cx, cy, init_x, init_y) {}
01058 
01059   void update(const well_type* w);
01060   void compute(split_func fn);
01061 
01062   double info(const well_type* w, int x, int y) const;
01063 
01064 private:
01065   well_point_set g1;
01066   well_grid g2;
01067 };
01068 
01069 void wg_wrapper::update(const well_type* w)
01070 {
01071   g1.update(w);
01072 }
01073 
01074 void wg_wrapper::compute(split_func fn)
01075 {
01076   well_graph g;
01077   g1.compute(g, fn, 0, 0);
01078   g2.populate(g);
01079 }
01080 
01081 inline double wg_wrapper::info(const well_type* w, int x, int y) const
01082 {
01083   return g2.inf(w, x-1, y-1);
01084 }
01085 
01086 extern "C" int __stdcall wg_create_uniform(int cx, int cy, double x1, double x2, double y1, double y2)
01087 {
01088   return (int) (new wg_wrapper(cx, cy, x1, x2, y1, y2));
01089 }
01090 
01091 extern "C" int __stdcall wg_create_nonuniform(int cx, int cy, double *init_x, double *init_y)
01092 {
01093   return (int) (new wg_wrapper(cx, cy, init_x, init_y));
01094 }
01095 
01096 extern "C" void __stdcall wg_destroy(int h)
01097 {
01098   delete ((wg_wrapper*) h);
01099 }
01100 
01101 extern "C" void __stdcall wg_update(int h, well_type* w)
01102 {
01103   ((wg_wrapper*) h)->update(w);
01104 }
01105 
01106 extern "C" void __stdcall wg_compute(int h, wg_wrapper::split_func fn)
01107 {
01108   ((wg_wrapper*) h)->compute(fn);
01109 }
01110 
01111 extern "C" double __stdcall wg_info(int h, well_type* w, int x, int y)
01112 {
01113   return ((wg_wrapper*) h)->info(w, x, y);
01114 }
01115 
01116 class polygon_grid
01117 {
01118 public:
01119   double left(int i) const;
01120   double right(int i) const;
01121   double top(int j) const;
01122   double bottom(int j) const;
01123   double inf(int i, int j) const;
01124 
01125   void populate(int n, double x[], double y[]);
01126   polygon_grid(int cx, int cy, double x1, double x2, double y1, double y2);
01127   polygon_grid(int cx, int cy, double *init_x, double *init_y);
01128   ~polygon_grid();
01129 
01130 private:
01131   int countof_x, countof_y;
01132   double *coord_x, *coord_y;
01133   leda_dictionary<int, double> grid_fn;
01134 };
01135 
01136 int compare(int k1, int k2)
01137 {
01138   if (k1 < k2) return -1;
01139   if (k1 > k2) return 1;
01140   return 0;
01141 }
01142 
01143 polygon_grid::polygon_grid(int cx, int cy, double x1, double x2, double y1, double y2): 
01144   countof_x(cx), countof_y(cy), grid_fn()
01145 {
01146   coord_x = new double[cx+1];
01147   coord_y = new double[cy+1];
01148 
01149   double dx = (x2 - x1) / cx;
01150   coord_x[0] = x1;
01151   for (int i = 0; i < cx; i++)
01152     coord_x[i+1] = coord_x[i] + dx;
01153 
01154   double dy = (y2 - y1) / cy;
01155   coord_y[0] = y1;
01156   for (int j = 0; j < cy; j++)
01157     coord_y[j+1] = coord_y[j] + dy;
01158 }
01159 
01160 polygon_grid::polygon_grid(int cx, int cy, double *init_x, double *init_y): 
01161   countof_x(cx), countof_y(cy), grid_fn()
01162 {
01163   coord_x = new double[cx+1];
01164   coord_y = new double[cy+1];
01165 
01166   for (int i = 0; i < cx+1; i++) 
01167     coord_x[i] = init_x[i];
01168 
01169   for (int j = 0; j < cy+1; j++)
01170     coord_y[j] = init_y[j];
01171 }
01172 
01173 polygon_grid::~polygon_grid()
01174 {
01175   delete[] coord_x;
01176   delete[] coord_y;
01177 }
01178 
01179 inline double polygon_grid::left(int i) const
01180 {
01181   return coord_x[i];
01182 }
01183 
01184 inline double polygon_grid::right(int i) const
01185 {
01186   return coord_x[i+1];
01187 }
01188 
01189 inline double polygon_grid::top(int j) const
01190 {
01191   return coord_y[j+1];
01192 }
01193 
01194 inline double polygon_grid::bottom(int j) const
01195 {
01196   return coord_y[j];
01197 }
01198 
01199 double polygon_grid::inf(int i, int j) const
01200 {
01201   leda::dic_item it = grid_fn.lookup(countof_x * j + i);
01202   if (it != nil)
01203     return grid_fn[it];
01204   return 0.0;
01205 }
01206 
01207 static double common_area1(leda_list<leda_point> numer, leda_rectangle& rect_c)
01208 {
01209   leda_list<leda_point> denom = rect_c.vertices();
01210   leda_list<leda_rat_point> rat_numer, rat_denom;
01211 
01212   leda_point p;
01213   forall(p, numer) {
01214     leda_rational x(p.xcoord()), y(p.ycoord());
01215     rat_numer.push_back(leda_rat_point(x, y));
01216   }
01217   forall(p, denom) {
01218     leda_rational x(p.xcoord()), y(p.ycoord());
01219     rat_denom.push_back(leda_rat_point(x, y));
01220   }
01221 
01222   leda::rat_gen_polygon p1(rat_numer), p2(rat_denom);
01223   return p1.intersection(p2).area().to_float() / rect_c.area();
01224 }
01225 
01226 static double common_area(leda_list<leda_point> numer, leda_rectangle& rect_c)
01227 {
01228   leda_list<leda_point> denom = rect_c.vertices();
01229 
01230   leda::gen_polygon p1(numer), p2(denom);
01231   return p1.intersection(p2).area() / rect_c.area();
01232 }
01233 
01234 void polygon_grid::populate(int n, double x[], double y[])
01235 {
01236   int i, j;
01237   if (!grid_fn.empty())
01238     grid_fn.clear();
01239 
01240   leda_list<leda_point> lp;
01241   for (i = 0; i < n; ++i)
01242     lp.append(leda_point(*x++, *y++));
01243 
01244   leda_point pl, pb, pr, pt;
01245   Bounding_Box(lp, pl, pb, pr, pt);
01246   leda_rectangle rect_f(pl.xcoord(), pb.ycoord(), pr.xcoord(), pt.ycoord());
01247 
01248   int x1 = std::lower_bound(coord_x, coord_x + countof_x, rect_f.xmin()) - coord_x;
01249   int x2 = std::upper_bound(coord_x, coord_x + countof_x, rect_f.xmax()) - coord_x;
01250   int y1 = std::lower_bound(coord_y, coord_y + countof_y, rect_f.ymin()) - coord_y;
01251   int y2 = std::upper_bound(coord_y, coord_y + countof_y, rect_f.ymax()) - coord_y;
01252   if (x1 != 0) --x1;
01253   if (y1 != 0) --y1;
01254 
01255   for (j = y1; j < y2; ++j) for (i = x1; i < x2; ++i)
01256   {
01257     leda_rectangle rect_c(left(i), bottom(j), right(i), top(j));
01258     if (rect_f.intersection(rect_c).empty())
01259       continue;
01260 
01261     double w = common_area(lp, rect_c);
01262     if (w > 0.0)
01263       grid_fn.insert(countof_x * j + i, w);
01264   }
01265 }

01268 {
01269   polygon_grid *p = new polygon_grid(cx, cy, x1, x2, y1, y2);
01270   return ((int) p);
01271 }

01275   polygon_grid* p = new polygon_grid(cx, cy, init_x, init_y);

01326 
01327 extern "C" int __stdcall wh_chull(int h, double delta, int* n, double* coord_x, double* coord_y)
01328 {
01329   well_point_set* ps = (well_point_set*) h;
01330   leda_list<leda_point> lp = ps->c_hull();
01331   int m = lp.size();
01332   if (m < 3 || m > *n)
01333   {
01334     *n = m;
01335     return 0;
01336   }
01337 
01338   if (delta <= 0.0)
01339   {
01340     leda_point pt;
01341     forall(pt, lp)
01342     {
01343       *coord_x++ = pt.xcoord();
01344       *coord_y++ = pt.ycoord();
01345     }
01346     *n = m;
01347     return 1;
01348   }
01349 
01350   leda_polygon pg(lp, leda_polygon::NO_CHECK);
01351   pg.eliminate_colinear_vertices();
01352   m = (pg.size() << 1);
01353   if (m > *n)
01354   {
01355     *n = m;
01356     return 0;
01357   }
01358 
01359   leda_segment s;
01360   forall_segments(s, pg)
01361   {
01362     double dx = s.dx(), dy = s.dy();
01363     leda_segment ss = s + leda_vector(dy, -dx).norm() * delta;
01364     *coord_x++ = ss.xcoord1();
01365     *coord_y++ = ss.ycoord1();
01366     *coord_x++ = ss.xcoord2();
01367     *coord_y++ = ss.ycoord2();
01368   }
01369   *n = m;
01370   return 1;
01371 }

01376 {
01377   return 0.5;

01380 void main()
01381 {
01382   double x1 = 1388105, x2 = 1428355, y1 = 706905, y2 = 784655;
01383   wg_wrapper g(350, 650, x1, x2, y1, y2);
01384 
01385   int n = 0;
01386   static well_type a[10000];
01387   while (std::cin >> a[n].name >> a[n].top_x >> a[n].top_y)
01388   {
01389     g.update(&a[n++]);
01390   }
01391   std::clog << n << " wells loaded\n";
01392 
01393   clock_t t = clock();
01394   g.compute(fn);
01395   std::cout << double(clock() - t) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC << " seconds elapsed\n";
01396 }
